description: The increasing use of anti-extremism laws to prosecute reporters is likely to have a chilling effect on the few independent journalists still operating in Russia.
title: Russia arrests more journalists in intensifying crackdown on dissent

description: Almost a month after seven World Central Kitchen aid workers were killed in an Israeli airstrike in Gaza, the group is resuming  humanitarian operations there.
title: World Central Kitchen will resume aid work in Gaza on Monday

description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken’s visit comes amid a push for a deal with Hamas, which released videos of three hostages, including of a dual U.S. citizen.
title: Blinken to travel to Saudi Arabia amid renewed push for a hostage deal

description: With Russian forces advancing on the battlefield, Ukrainian  citizens are aiding their country’s defense by building drones at home and sending them to the front.
title: As Ukraine runs low on ammo, civilians build troops DIY drones at home
